participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, Ethan enjoys connecting with others and has a strong sense of family.
participant_1.background: I'm curious about my family's history and where we came from. I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers. I do not have my own home yet. My wife is a breast cancer survivor. I work as a tutor for English literature.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and artistic, Lily has a zest for life and enjoys expressing herself through various mediums.
participant_2.background: I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July. I work for a small, family owned restaurant. My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one. I have taken formal music lessons since I was 5. My favorite class is painting.

content.text: I am doing well! Just hanging out at home. I am a barista and I love to create delicious coffee drinks.
That sounds fun! I work for a small, family owned restaurant.
Oh that sounds nice! What kind of food do you serve?
We serve American food. We have a lot of burgers, salads, and chicken dishes.
That sounds yummy! Do you have a favorite dish on the menu?
I love our chicken parmigiana! It is so delicious!
That sounds delicious! I love chicken parm!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my wife and family. We like to go out to eat and go to the movies.
That sounds fun! I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love the Fourth of July!
Me too! It is my favorite holiday!
Me too! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to paint! I have taken formal music lessons since I was 5.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to learn how to paint
